department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Construction services at Central Experimental Farm (CEF) Buildings B21/B22 in Ottawa Ontario, Canada that involves the installation of new electrical equipment as well as demolition of existing electrical equipment and components and retrofit of existing electrical equipment and components.
description: The contract is to perform remediation of electrical system deficiencies at a number of buildings on the Central Experimental Farm, located in Ottawa, Ontario. The Global Work includes: - Installation of new electrical equipment - Demolition of existing electrical equipment and components - Retrofit of existing electrical equipment and components in buildings B21 and B22 at the CEF.
tags: Electrical equipment maintenance and repair service
full_summary:
### High Voltage System Modifications Buildings FEC B21  B22

#### Request for Proposal

**Reference Number**: WS4671649289-Doc4671723512

**Modification Number**: 4

#### Important Dates

*   **Publication Date**: July 8, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: July 30, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
*   **Amendment Date**: July 26, 2024
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 1, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A

#### Contract Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide high voltage system modifications services at Central Experimental Farm (CEF) Buildings B21/B22 in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. The project involves installing new electrical equipment, demolishing existing electrical equipment and components, and retrofitting existing electrical equipment and components.

#### Scope of Work
The successful bidder will be responsible for the following services:

*   Installation of new electrical equipment
*   Demolition of existing electrical equipment and components
*   Retrofitting of existing electrical equipment and components
*   Electrical power transmission engineering services

#### Evaluation Criteria
The procurement will be conducted using a competitive bidding process, where the lowest price will be the primary evaluation criterion.

#### Notification
As a Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) covered contract, this tender opportunity is open to all eligible suppliers. Notice of this opportunity was published in the MERX website.

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Dale Rudderham, Procurement Specialist
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Phone: 819-956-8399
Email: [dale.rudderham@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dale.rudderham@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

You can review the complete tender documentation, including the scope of work, evaluation criteria, and terms and conditions, by visiting the MERX website at [the provided URL link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20234912?extsite=MjAyMzQ5MTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). Tender submissions must be received by July 30, 2024, 2:00 PM EST. A site visit is optional and will be conducted on July 16, 2024, at 10:00
